jld.title: Justia Elevate Platform Updates
description: The Justia Elevate platform was updated to incorporate improvements and upgrades for your siteâ€™s PageSpeed, reviews, and schema, among others, that enhance the overall usability of the Justia Elevate platform.
jld.title2: Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated
description2: Your Yoast SEO plugin had a complete overhaul! The new interface is designed to enhance the user experience and facilitate finding and using its features. To learn more about these upgrades, check out this post from Yoast. There were also inclusive language analysis improvements.
description3: We added new integrations to the Justia Elevate platform that simplify the setup process for the Intaker, Kenect, and Podium chat platforms! Getting started with your chat integration is a simple, straightforward process. For more information, please read this resource.
